definition: A term commonly employed to describe the manner in which individuals or groups of people live, encompassing their habits, customs, and overall way of life. It is often used in discussions related to cultural anthropology, sociology, or when examining the behavior and practices of specific communities or societies.

examples.german: Die Lebensweise der Menschen in diesem Dorf ist sehr traditionell.
examples.english: The way of life of the people in this village is very traditional.

examples.german: Die moderne Lebensweise hat zu vielen Gesundheitsproblemen geführt.
examples.english: Modern lifestyle has led to many health problems.

examples.german: Die Lebensweise der Tiere in diesem Zoo wird so natürlich wie möglich gehalten.
examples.english: The way of life of the animals in this zoo is kept as natural as possible.

examples.german: Die Lebensweise der Ureinwohner ist eng mit der Natur verbunden.
examples.english: The way of life of the indigenous people is closely connected to nature.

examples.german: Die Lebensweise der Menschen in verschiedenen Kulturen kann sehr unterschiedlich sein.
examples.english: The way of life of people in different cultures can be very different.
